## Ponder

**Network centrality applications**

Borgatti, S. P. (2005). [*Centrality and network flow*](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.socnet.2004.11.008). Social Networks, 27(1), 55-71.

**Identifying key players in networks**

Borgatti, S. P. (2006). [*Identifying sets of key players in a social network*](https://doi.org/10.1007/s10588-006-7084-x). Computational & Mathematical Organization Theory, 12(1), 21-34.

**Centrality in organizational networks**

Sparrowe, R. T., Liden, R. C., Wayne, S. J., & Kraimer, M. L. (2001). [*Social networks and the performance of individuals and groups*](https://doi.org/10.5465/amj.2001.4378755). Academy of Management Journal, 44(2), 316-325.
